Package alphabetsoup.framework

Interface Summary
Bucket Bucket defines the interface that buckets must implement in order to properly interact within AlphabetSoup.
Bucketbot Bucketbot defines the interface that robots (bucketbots) must provide to operate in AlphabetSoup.
LetterStation LetterStation defines the interface that letter stations must provide to operate in AlphabetSoup.
Updateable Updateable is an interface which should be implemented by any agent in the system.
WordList WordList manages the incoming and outgoing Words of AlphabetSoup.
WordStation WordStation defines the interface that word stations must provide to operate in AlphabetSoup.
 

Class Summary
Circle Class Circle implements a circle in 2D space and functions to determine its relation to other geometric shapes (such as collisions with rectangles and circles)
Letter The class Letter makes up wordList for completion It is dispensed by LetterStation, carried in Bucket, and consumed by WordStation
LetterColor LetterColor represents the color of a Letter tile.
LetterType LetterType extends Letter such that a Letter can be referred to as its type e.g.
Map Map manages the spatial location of all of the buckets, bucketbots, and stations.
MersenneTwisterFast MersenneTwister and MersenneTwisterFast
Quadtree Quadtree mantains a tree where each node quadrasects the area of its parent, used for fast lookup of local interactions between objects.
QuadtreeNode QuadtreeNode is the class that makes up the nodes of the Quadtree and performs recursive functions.
SimulationWorld SimulationWorld is the base class of the AlphabetSoup simulation itself.
Word The class Word contains Letter objects that make up a word that must be completed.
